description: [Unhosted](https://unhosted.org/) - also known as "serverless", "client-side", or "static" web apps, unhosted web apps do not send your user data to their server. Either you connect your own server at runtime, or your data stays within the browser.
ohloh_description: Unhosted is an open web standard for decentralizing user data. On the unhosted web, data is stored per-user, wherever the user decides
name: Unhosted
